Translations.Text: Ami tomalokaka ghrnaniya panira paraa srsti karaa na'ine
tara pichata ami iyaka niraapada sthanata suraksita karai raakhicho
eta nirdista samaya laike
tara pichata ami paraimapa karaicho, eteke ami kimana nipuna paraimapakarai
se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Ami prthiraikhanaka dharanakarairaupe srsti karaa na'ine
jiraitasakala arau mrtasakalara babe
arau ami tata sthapana karaicho sudrrha arau su'ucca parbatasamuha arau tomalokaka pana karaa'icho trsna nibaranakarai mitha upayogi pani
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
(Sihamtaka koraa ha’ba) tomaloke yaka asbikara karaichila, etiya gati karaa taraphale
Yoraa tinita sakha bisista ju'ira chamra pine
yito cham sitala nahaya arau i agnisikhara paraa raksa'o nakaraiba
niscaya jahanname utksepana karaiba brhat atraalika sadrsa phirainati
enekuraa yena haladhiya utara sraeni
se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
E'ito enekuraa dina yidina sihamte katha ka’ba noraaraiba
arau sihamtaka ajuhata peca karaara anumati'o diya naha’ba
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
‘E'ito phayacalara dina ami ekatraita karaicho tomalokaka arau purbarartisakalaka’
Eteke yadi tomalokara kono kausala ache tente prayoga karaa mora biraud'dhe
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Niscaya muttakbisakala thakiba chamra talata arau nijaraa bahula sthanata
arau sihamtara hempaha anuyayi phalamulara majata
(Sihamtaka koraa ha'ba) tomaloke yi amala karaichila tara pratidanasbaraupe trptira saite panahara karaa
satkarmasilasakalaka ami enekuraa'i pratidana di thako
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
(He kaphirasakala!) Tomaloke ahara karaa arau bhoga karaa khantekara babe; niscaya tomaloka aparaadhi
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Yetiya sihamtaka koraa haya, ‘rauku’ karaa sihamte rauku’ nakarae’
Se'i dina durbhoga mithyaraopakaraisakalara babe
Eteke kora'anara paraibarte sihamte arau kona banira prati imana aniba
